column5: You might want to check out this little upgrade. Wonder if it would last in our climate.  http://www.disappearing-car-door.com/
that is ridiculous, pointless invention, i see scientists are really bored! !
I want one that is an awesome invention....
wonder how that would be when it opens going down the highway,,lol...pretty neet!

Scientists might be bored but the engineers that came up with this puppy are on to something. Limos, handicapped vehicles... Imagine the exposure... pull up to the red carpet at the Acadamy Awards... roll down the door... Paris Hilton hikes up the skirt. Wait a sec... what would she be doing at an awards show? Nevermind. -Brian
She might be at the Adult Entertainment Awards????
hahahah, i wonder if u can control which side u open  this car is made for hollywood
I thought it was pretty cool! Something totally different.
That is so cool. I hope that everybody get's one, so the next time I buy a new *&$%^&@# car, some idiot don't open up there door and leave me with a nice dent in mine.
